text: Lancer France Mendoza Serrano (born May 22, 1990 in Mandaluyong City, Philippines), better known as Lance Serrano, is a Filipino actor, commercial model and gym instructor, Serrano has several tv shows on GMA Network. ==Career== Serrano is a part of ABS-CBN before he appeared on its rival network GMA. Lance was a contract at Star Magic (2009) then transferred to GMA Artist Center on 2013. He's known for his role as Steve in Galema: Anak ni Zuma. He's a gym instructor and commercial model, appearing on (Emperador Light), (Judge) and (Jollibee) commercials. He was also part of Demigod for hunk modeling. His first guesting at a talk show was in The Ryzza Mae Show appearing alongside best child host for 2013 Ryzza Mae Dizon. He was also included in the Telefantasya series, Encantadia, wherein he played the Adamyan Memfes. ==Television== {| class="wikitable" |- |Year |Title |Role |Network |- | rowspan="2"| 2013 || The Ryzza Mae Show || rowspan="2"| Himself/Guest || rowspan="2"| GMA Network |- | Eat Bulaga! |- | 2013-2014 || Galema: Anak ni Zuma || Steve || ABS-CBN |- | rowspan="6"| 2015 || Pepito Manaloto || Himself/Guest || rowspan="11"| GMA Network |- | Maynila: Hugot Pa More || |- | The Rich Man's Daughter || Leo |- | My Faithful Husband || |- | Maynila: My Angels, My Valentines || |- | Maynila: Feelingera na, Assumera pa || |- Love Hotline || With Arianne Bautista | | 2015-2016 || Because of You || Randy |- | 2016 || Naku, Boss Ko! || Andrei |- | rowspan="2"| 2017 || Encantadia || Memfes (Adamya's Kingdom) |- | #Magpakailanman: ErwinDayrit || Roy |- | 2018 || Maynila: Ganti ng Anak || Ricky |- | 2018-2019 || FPJ's Ang Probinsyano || PS/Insp.
